name: node.js
description: Node.js is a platform built on Chrome's JavaScript runtime for easily building fast, scalable network applications.

name: groovy
description: Groovy is an object-oriented programming language for the Java platform. It is a dynamic language with features similar to those of Python, Ruby, Perl, and Smalltalk.

name: grails
description: Grails is an open source web application framework that uses the Groovy programming language.

name: java
description: Java is a general-purpose, concurrent, class-based, object-oriented computer programming language that is specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

name: mysql
description: The world's most widely used relational database management system

name: hibernate
description: Object-relational mapping (ORM) library for the Java language, providing a framework for mapping an object-oriented domain model to a traditional relational database.

name: mongodb
description: MongoDB (from 'humongous') is a cross-platform document-oriented database system.

name: html
description: HyperText Markup Language (HTML) is the main markup language for creating web pages and other information that can be displayed in a web browser.

name: jade
description: Jade is a high performance template engine heavily influenced by Haml and implemented with JavaScript for node.

name: css
description: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation semantics (the look and formatting) of a document written in a markup language.

name: less
description: The dynamic stylesheet language. LESS extends CSS with dynamic behavior such as variables, mixins, operations and functions.

name: javascript
description: JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language with dynamic typing and has first-class functions.

name: backbone
description: Backbone supplies structure to JavaScript-heavy applications.

name: angular
description: AngularJS is what HTML would have been, had it been designed for building web-apps.

name: php
description: PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development but also used as a general-purpose programming language.

name: magento
description: Magento is an open source e-commerce web application that was launched on March 31, 2008 under the name Bento.

name: wordpress
description: WordPress is a free and open source blogging tool and a content management system (CMS) based on PHP and MySQL

name: cassandra
description: The Apache Cassandra database is the right choice when you need scalability and high availability without compromising performance.
